Text: EIM steel transactions pipeline update Cc Attached is the updated status of the steel tradestransactions that have potential LOCcashflow impact in the next few months According to Kent who had a direct conversation with Bowen late yesterday all new steel tradesstructured transactions not yet agreed to will require Bowen approval prior to being reviewed by RAC In summary the commitment status for the Kibar and EDZK trades is yet to be determined upon reviewing the taped conversation between the traders and the counterparties Duferco payments for the final ton slab purchase and the option are up for restructuring next week with the company Please let me know if you have any questionsconcerns Thanks
